headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Bulk Buy
content: You can now purchase full ammunition for any weapon in Ammu-Nation â€“ simply browse the weapon wall, select a weapon and hit ~INPUT_FRONTEND_X~ when buying ammunition to toggle buying the maximum amount.~n~~n~You can also stock up on ammo for all your weapons in a DM/LTS/Capture/Mission Lobby in one fell swoop.
